Class ClassAttendanceSummary

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.logic.ClassAttendanceSummary
public class ClassAttendanceSummary extends Object
Represents a summary of attendance for a class, including counts of present, absent, excused, and late occurrences.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    ClassAttendanceSummary.MonthlyAttendanceSummary
    Represents a summary of monthly attendance statistics.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int
    absentCount

    private int
    classId
    The unique identifier of the class.
    private String
    courseName
    The name of the course associated with the class.
    private int
    excusedCount
    The number of students whose absence was excused in the class.
    private int
    lateCount
    The number of students marked as late in the class.
    private int
    presentCount
    The number of students marked as present in the class.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClassAttendanceSummary

      public ClassAttendanceSummary(int classId, String courseName, int presentCount, int absentCount, int excusedCount, int lateCount)
      Constructs a ClassAttendanceSummary with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      classId - the unique identifier of the class
      courseName - the name of the course
      presentCount - the number of students marked as present
      absentCount - the number of students marked as absent
      excusedCount - the number of excused absences
      lateCount - the number of students marked as late
